situations.title: Yet another day in life...
situations.description:
Wife again insulted for being away most of the time. Which seemed like a staged play. Children barely come close.
 No Surprise. Of course your wife has misguided them to be away.
Thinking about where you made a mistake you didn't sleep.
 As expected you went to office late. Boss called you at once

situations.title: Yet another day in life...
situations.description: You are not late to office and your boss is still boiling. Such is life. .... .... ...
